scripts.dev: cross-env NEXT_SWC_USE_WASM=1 NEXT_PRIVATE_USE_TURBOPACK=0 NEXT_SHOULD_USE_TURBOPACK=0 NEXT_SHOULD_RUN_TURBOPACK=0 next dev
scripts.build: cross-env NEXT_SWC_USE_WASM=1 NEXT_PRIVATE_USE_TURBOPACK=0 NEXT_SHOULD_USE_TURBOPACK=0 NEXT_SHOULD_RUN_TURBOPACK=0 next build
scripts.start: cross-env NEXT_SWC_USE_WASM=1 NEXT_PRIVATE_USE_TURBOPACK=0 NEXT_SHOULD_USE_TURBOPACK=0 NEXT_SHOULD_RUN_TURBOPACK=0 next start
